alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland Martin; Inland Southern Brevard; Inland St. Lucie; Mainland Southern Brevard; Okeechobee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 31 at 4:51AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Patchy Dense Fog Developing Over Parts of the Treasure Coast, Okeechobee County, and Southern Brevard County... At 450 AM, surface observations and traffic cameras indicated patchy dense fog was starting to develop from southern Brevard County through the Treasure Coast and inland towards Okeechobee County. Localized visibilities of half a mile or less will be possible through early this morning. If you will be driving in this area, especially along I-95 and the Florida Turnpike, prepare to encounter rapid reductions in visibility. If you encounter dense fog, reduce your speed, use only your low beam headlights, and leave extra distance between your vehicle and the one in front of you.
